EmailTemplate.name: WRF - Exisiting WRF Open
EmailTemplate.subject: Existing WRF Open - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Current Request Info: {!Case.Subject}
Your recent request is related to an open WRF (Enter WRF #), and a new WRF is not required. This WRF ({!Case.CaseNumber}) will be closed.
For additional work related the open WRF, contact any member of your previously assigned bid team that are needed (Pricing Analyst, Bid Writer, and/or Compliance Manager) detailing what is needed.
If your request requires an Analyst or Compliance Manager that was not tasked on the prior WRF, please let me know and we will have one assigned.
Thank you,
BSD Bids BSD-Bids@officedepot.com
